actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: To amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to prohibit the imposition or collection of fees to cover the cost of providing agricultural quarantine and inspection services at a port in the State of Hawaii or the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico.

summary.text: Amends the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from collecting fees for agricultural quarantine and inspection services in Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

titles.title: To amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to prohibit the imposition or collection of fees to cover the cost of providing agricultural quarantine and inspection services at a port in the State of Hawaii or the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico.
